name: Baila Latino
description: A dance game that will bring absolute fun to all your family and friends! American Latin Music is suitable for all ages and makes children and adults dance, creating an atmosphere of great amusement in front of the tv. 20 hit songs among the most famous and exciting ones have been choosing with very competence by O2 GAMES. The game has been realized with studied choreographies by professional dancers Carlo Romano and Vera Sokolova from the prestigious “Carolyn Smith Dance Academy”. You can play alone or with friends, up to four players at the same time. On the Wii U™ GamePad will appear the lyrics of the song so while you are dancing, the others can sing! Baila Latino will take a lot of fun in your family!
